languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, на связи форт {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Имперского флота{/g} "Обод Эриоха". Комендант выражает вам благодарность за сотрудничество и заверяет, что дарованная вами станция стала оплотом в этой системе. Пираты и еретики бегут прочь от патрулей на радость законопослушным торговцам!"

"Lord Captain, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} Fort Heriokh's Rim hails us. The commander thanks you for your cooperation and reports that the station you bestowed has become a stronghold in this system. Pirates and heretics flee from patrols to the delight of law-abiding merchants!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, на связи форт {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Имперского флота{/g} "Обод Эриоха". Комендант выражает вам благодарность за сотрудничество и заверяет, что дарованная вами станция стала оплотом в этой системе. Пираты и еретики бегут прочь от патрулей на радость законопослушным торговцам!"

"Lord Captain, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} Fort Heriokh's Rim hails us. The commander thanks you for your cooperation and reports that the station you bestowed has become a stronghold in this system. Pirates and heretics flee from patrols to the delight of law-abiding merchants!"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el Fuerte de Borde de Heriokh, de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Armada Imperial{/g}, ha establecido contacto. El comandante le agradece su cooperación y le informa de que la estación que les proporcionó se ha convertido en un bastión de este sistema. ¡Los piratas y herejes huyen de las patrullas! Es todo un alivio para los mercaderes honrados».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} Fort Heriokh's Rim hails us. The commander thanks you for your cooperation and reports that the station you bestowed has become a stronghold in this system. Pirates and heretics flee from patrols to the delight of law-abiding merchants!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el Fuerte de Borde de Heriokh, de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Armada Imperial{/g}, ha establecido contacto. El comandante le agradece su cooperación y le informa de que la estación que les proporcionó se ha convertido en un bastión de este sistema. ¡Los piratas y herejes huyen de las patrullas! Es todo un alivio para los mercaderes honrados».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}帝国海軍{/g}ヘリオク要塞のリムからです。司令官は御身の協力に感謝していて、御身が授けたステーションがこの星系で拠点となったと言っております。海賊や異端者がパトロールから逃げ出し、法を守る商人たちを楽しませています！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} Fort Heriokh's Rim hails us. The commander thanks you for your cooperation and reports that the station you bestowed has become a stronghold in this system. Pirates and heretics flee from patrols to the delight of law-abiding merchants!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}帝国海軍{/g}ヘリオク要塞のリムからです。司令官は御身の協力に感謝していて、御身が授けたステーションがこの星系で拠点となったと言っております。海賊や異端者がパトロールから逃げ出し、法を守る商人たちを楽しませています！」

languages.text: “舰长大人，{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}帝国海军{/g}麾下的赫里奥卡要塞向我们致敬。帝国指挥官感谢您的合作，同时报告说，您赐予他们的这座星站如今已经成为了这个星系的要塞。海盗与异端分子在海军巡逻舰面前望风而逃，所有遵纪守法的商人都欢欣不已！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} Fort Heriokh's Rim hails us. The commander thanks you for your cooperation and reports that the station you bestowed has become a stronghold in this system. Pirates and heretics flee from patrols to the delight of law-abiding merchants!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}帝国海军{/g}麾下的赫里奥卡要塞向我们致敬。帝国指挥官感谢您的合作，同时报告说，您赐予他们的这座星站如今已经成为了这个星系的要塞。海盗与异端分子在海军巡逻舰面前望风而逃，所有遵纪守法的商人都欢欣不已！”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Leerenfestung Heriokhs Rand von der {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}imperialen Kriegsflotte{/g} grüßt uns. Der Commander dankt Euch für Eure Kooperation und meldet, dass sich die Station zu einer Festung dieses Systems gemausert hat. Piraten und Ketzer fliehen zur großen Freude gesetzestreuer Kaufleute vor ihren Patrouillen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} Fort Heriokh's Rim hails us. The commander thanks you for your cooperation and reports that the station you bestowed has become a stronghold in this system. Pirates and heretics flee from patrols to the delight of law-abiding merchants!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Leerenfestung Heriokhs Rand von der {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}imperialen Kriegsflotte{/g} grüßt uns. Der Commander dankt Euch für Eure Kooperation und meldet, dass sich die Station zu einer Festung dieses Systems gemausert hat. Piraten und Ketzer fliehen zur großen Freude gesetzestreuer Kaufleute vor ihren Patrouillen."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, la forteresse de la Faille d'Heriokh, sous contrôle de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}marine impériale{/g}, nous salue. Le commandant vous remercie pour votre coopération et vous informe que la station que vous avez créée est devenue une véritable place forte dans ce système. Les pirates et les hérétiques fuient les patrouilles, pour le plus grand bonheur des marchands ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} Fort Heriokh's Rim hails us. The commander thanks you for your cooperation and reports that the station you bestowed has become a stronghold in this system. Pirates and heretics flee from patrols to the delight of law-abiding merchants!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, la forteresse de la Faille d'Heriokh, sous contrôle de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}marine impériale{/g}, nous salue. Le commandant vous remercie pour votre coopération et vous informe que la station que vous avez créée est devenue une véritable place forte dans ce système. Les pirates et les hérétiques fuient les patrouilles, pour le plus grand bonheur des marchands ! »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}İmparatorluk Donanması{/g}'nın Heriokh'un Ağzı Uçsuz Hisarı bizi selamlıyor. Komutan, iş birliğiniz için teşekkürlerini sunarak varlığınızla kutsadığınız istasyonun artık bu sistemdeki bir müstahkem mevki olduğunu bildiriyor. Korsanlar ile kâfirlerin devriye güçlerinden kaçması neticesinde kanuna uyan tüccarların keyifleri yerinde!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} Fort Heriokh's Rim hails us. The commander thanks you for your cooperation and reports that the station you bestowed has become a stronghold in this system. Pirates and heretics flee from patrols to the delight of law-abiding merchants!"
